info.description:
API definition for eRS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[e-Referral Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description: See [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: Appointment

tags.name: ServiceRequest
tags.description: See [England-ServiceRequest](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-ServiceRequest.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: ServiceRequest

tags.name: Task
tags.description: See [NHSDigital-Task](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Task.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: Task

tags.name: Slot
tags.description: See [England-Slot](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Slot.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: Slot

tags.name: HealthcareService
tags.description: See [NHSDigital-HealthcareService](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-HealthcareService.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: HealthcareService

tags.name: DocumentReference
tags.description: See [England-DocumentReference](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-DocumentReference.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: DocumentReference

tags.name: List
tags.description: See [England-DocumentReference](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-DocumentReference.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: List

tags.name: Binary
tags.description: See [NHSDigital-Binary](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Binary.guide.md) for documentation. Resource type: Binary

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Appointment instance

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing ServiceRequest instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description: The patient identifier (e.g. NHS Number) that the service request is about

post.summary: create-type: Create a new ServiceRequest instance

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing Task instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Task instance

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)

parameters.name: schedule.actor:HealthcareService
parameters.description: A single service ID is required to indicate the service for which appointment slots are required.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The free/busy status of the appointment

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description: The type of service provided by this healthcare service

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Can't find this parameter presume need to: External identifiers for this item

get.description: Unable to find existing matching service

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Binary instance

CapabilityStatement.description: See resource [CapabilityStatement](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/CapabilityStatement.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

Appointment.description: See [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md) for the FHIR Profile on resource [Appointment](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Appointment.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

OperationOutcome.description: See resource [OperationOutcome](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/OperationOutcome.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

Bundle.description: See resource [Bundle](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Bundle.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)
